title: Linux depmod Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the purpose of the depmod command, understand the dependency tree of kernel modules, and troubleshoot module dependencies using practical examples.

meta.title: Linux depmod Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the purpose of the depmod command, understand the dependency tree of kernel modules, and troubleshoot module dependencies using practical examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, depmod, kernel modules, dependency, troubleshoot, system configuration

steps.title: Understand the Purpose of the depmod Command

verify.name: Verify the depmod command was executed
verify.hint: The depmod command should have generated the /lib/modules/5.15.0-1023-aws/modules.dep file. Please ensure that the command was executed successfully.

steps.title: Explore the Dependency Tree of Kernel Modules

verify.name: Verify the dependency tree output
verify.hint: The depmod -n -a command should have displayed the dependency tree for the acpi_power_meter kernel module. Please ensure that the output contains the expected information.

verify.name: Verify the hello_dependent module was loaded
verify.hint: The hello_dependent module should have been loaded successfully and printed the "Hello Dependent Module!" message in the kernel logs. Please ensure that the module was loaded correctly.
